verses.name: Genesis 24:23
verses.text: And said, Whose daughter art thou? tell me, I pray thee: is there room in thy father’s house for us to lodge in?

verses.name: Genesis 24:24
verses.text: And she said unto him, I am the daughter of Bethuel the son of Milcah, which she bare unto Nahor.

verses.name: Genesis 24:25
verses.text: She said moreover unto him, We have both straw and provender enough, and room to lodge in.

verses.name: Genesis 24:26
verses.text: And the man bowed down his head, and worshipped the Lord.
